title: Get connection details for connecting to the Service Management IdM
content:
This topic contains instructions to get the connection details to connect with the Service Management IdM. 

Use this information during the preparation of the sensitive data required by OO installation. 

Obtain the password for the IdM transport user

Run the following commands to obtain the password from Service Management's vault for the user idmTransportUser.

  • Get the Service Management namespace: 
    SMAX_NS=$(echo `kubectl get ns | grep itsma | awk '{print $1}'`) && echo $SMAX_NS
  • Get the IdM's pod name: 
    SMAX_IDM_POD=$(echo `kubectl get pods -n $SMAX_NS | grep -m1 idm- | head -1 | awk '{print $1}'`) && echo $SMAX_IDM_POD
  • Get the password for the Service Management IdM user idmTransportUser: 
    TRANSPORT_PASS=$(kubectl exec -it $SMAX_IDM_POD -n $SMAX_NS -c idm -- bash -c "/bin/get_secret idm_transport_admin_password_secret_key" | awk -F= '{print$2}') && echo $TRANSPORT_PASS
